abstract: The combination did not protect against heart attacks and strokes in a large clinical trial, and the company said it would no longer pursue its approval in the United States.
snippet: The combination did not protect against heart attacks and strokes in a large clinical trial, and the company said it would no longer pursue its approval in the United States.
lead_paragraph: The drug maker Merck announced on Thursday that a combination of niacin and another medicine failed to protect against heart attacks and strokes in a large clinical trial, and that the company would no longer pursue approval of the combination drug in the United States.

headline.main: Merck Says Niacin Drug Has Failed Large Trial
headline.print_headline: Merck Says Niacin Drug Has Failed Large Trial
